h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: Arriving in this realm of the past, you’ll find yourself in a large canyon. Head up to find a Shrine on the left, and be sure to check the shop in this secret realm, as it offers wares not sold in the rest of the Yellow Wind Ridge:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Sandgate Pass'.
The content is as follows:
Arriving in this realm of the past, you’ll find yourself in a large canyon. Head up to find a Shrine on the left, and be sure to check the shop in this secret realm, as it offers wares not sold in the rest of the Yellow Wind Ridge:
